data.lyric:
[ti:Final Warning (Explicit)]
[ar:NLE Choppa]
[al:Final Warning (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.86]Final Warning (Explicit) - NLE Choppa
[00:02.45]Lyrics by：Bryson Potts/Elisner Joseph
[00:03.28]
[00:05.47]Dun dun dun
[00:08.07]NLE the Top Shotta got the bombs like Al-Qaeda
[00:09.74]D**n E this s**t exclusive
[00:11.17]Ayy ayy
[00:12.15]Never send a threat on the internet just to prove a point
[00:14.99]That dissin' don't get into that we leavin' that to the informants
[00:17.85]Don't inform me about who informing that's yo' final warning
[00:20.90]7.62s sting like a Bumblebee he start transforming
[00:23.61]Send yo' homies on the drill but they ain't never make it back
[00:26.68]Shoot up the scat we left it flat he died on the impact
[00:29.50]My shooter he a gym rat but never mentioned who he cracked
[00:32.54]We put you on the news and I bet his family viewed that
[00:35.59]Slide by myself before I call a n***a
[00:37.98]My fingernails dirty 'cause I'm still a gravedigger
[00:41.01]And we ain't cappin' don't ask if we never pulled a trigger
[00:43.90]And Goon steady putting Jimmy Glow up in his Swisher
[00:46.80]Never been the one to save the day I'm the one clutchin' on the Drac'
[00:50.27]Make sure he don't get away a opp the only thing I chase
[00:53.18]In a full race the back of his neck hit the ground to decay
[00:56.24]Walk up to him C Grape stood over put one in his face
[00:59.15]Murkin' what my soul say
[01:00.51]I'm slidin' with this throwaway
[01:02.14]My heater for a cold day leave a n***a in disarray
[01:05.03]Better stay up in the house like the n***a from That's So Raven
[01:08.05]Catch that n***a walkin' out we in the bushes we been waiting
[01:10.95]Never send a threat on the internet just to prove a point
[01:13.87]That dissin' don't get into that we leavin' that to the informants
[01:16.84]Don't inform me about who informing that's yo' final warning
[01:19.76]7.62s sting like a Bumblebee he start transforming
[01:22.47]Send yo' homies on the drill but they ain't never make it back
[01:25.62]Shoot up the scat we left it flat he died on the impact
[01:28.46]My shooter he a gym rat but never mentioned 'til' we crashed
[01:31.52]We put you on the news and I bet his family viewed that
[01:34.28]Ayy smilin' on my mugshot 'cause I know my bond money good
[01:37.40]I ain't missed a heartbeat I'm out the next day it's understood
[01:40.36]To the Broward County Police lick my nuts and suck my wood
[01:43.34]First day tray and n***a you start mugging wish a n***a would
[01:46.32]Doing donuts in the SRT I crashed into a tree
[01:49.18]Rolls truck the next week money ain't been s**t to me
[01:52.17]Ridin' with a full clip but the gas tank on E
[01:55.06]Slidin' like a cruise ship wet you up like a jet ski
[01:58.10]Livin' to a hundred and three that's the OG Grape in me
[02:01.00]Auntie wanna pray for me better pray for my enemies
[02:03.74]Life had gave me lemons so I start clutchin' the lemon squeeze
[02:07.10]Had a AR F15 and two Glocks 223's
[02:09.85]Never send a threat on the internet just to prove a point
[02:12.82]That dissin' don't get into that we leavin' that to the informants
[02:15.67]Don't inform me about who informing that's yo' final warning
[02:18.60]7.62s sting like a Bumblebee he start transforming
[02:21.29]Send yo' homies on the drill but they ain't never make it back
[02:24.56]Shoot up the scat we left it flat he died on the impact
[02:27.41]My shooter he a gym rat but never mentioned who he cracked
[02:30.27]We put you on the news and I bet his family viewed that
data.trans:
[ti:Final Warning (Explicit)]
[ar:NLE Choppa]
[al:Final Warning (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.86]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.45]//
[00:03.28]
[00:05.47]//
[00:08.07]所向披靡的NLE拥有过人的本领
[00:09.74]Damn E制作
[00:11.17]//
[00:12.15]绝对不要为了求证在网上发出威胁警告
[00:14.99]我们不会跟敌人掀起骂战 我们把这些破事留给告密者
[00:17.85]不要告诉我究竟是谁暗中告密 我最后一次警告你
[00:20.90]7.62毫米的步枪倾泻火力 就像大黄蜂一样 他开始变形
[00:23.61]派你的朋友加入混战 但是他们永远也回不来了
[00:26.68]朝着车子开枪 把轮胎打爆 他因为剧烈撞击而死
[00:29.50]我的枪手是健身狂人 但是对他干掉的人闭口不提
[00:32.54]我们让你登上电视新闻 我打赌你的家人看见你的死讯
[00:35.59]在我打电话叫人以前 我独自行动
[00:37.98]我的指甲肮脏不堪 因为我依然是个掘墓人
[00:41.01]我们不会装腔作势 不要问我们是否扣下扳机
[00:43.90]Goon准备把狠货放进他的雪茄烟里
[00:46.80]我从来就不是拯救世界的英雄 我是拿着德拉科枪的恶棍
[00:50.27]确保他不会逃之夭夭 敌人是我唯一的追求
[00:53.18]在一场全速比赛中 他的脖子后面撞到地上 变得血肉模糊
[00:56.24]向他走去 我站在他面前 打中他的脸
[00:59.15]扼杀我的灵魂要说的话
[01:00.51]我带着非法枪支招摇过市
[01:02.14]我的武器为寒冷的日子而准备 让一个家伙陷入混乱
[01:05.03]最好像《天才魔女》里的那个家伙一样待在家里
[01:08.05]干掉那个走出来的家伙 我们埋伏在灌木丛里 静心等待
[01:10.95]绝对不要为了求证在网上发出威胁警告
[01:13.87]我们不会跟敌人掀起骂战 我们把这些破事留给告密者
[01:16.84]不要告诉我究竟是谁暗中告密 我最后一次警告你
[01:19.76]7.62毫米的步枪倾泻火力 就像大黄蜂一样 他开始变形
[01:22.47]派你的朋友加入混战 但是他们永远也回不来了
[01:25.62]朝着车子开枪 把轮胎打爆 他因为剧烈撞击而死
[01:28.46]我的枪手是健身狂人 但是对他干掉的人闭口不提
[01:31.52]我们让你登上电视新闻 我打赌你的家人看见你的死讯
[01:34.28]我笑容满面 因为我知道的钞票妙不可言
[01:37.40]我不会漏过任何一次心跳 我第二天就出去 大家都心照不宣
[01:40.36]来到布劳沃德县警察局 卖力地讨好我
[01:43.34]第一天卖货 你开始拦路抢劫 希望我也如此
[01:46.32]开着道奇地狱猫在原地绕圈 我撞到树上
[01:49.18]下周就买一辆劳斯莱斯 钞票对我来说不值一提
[01:52.17]弹夹里装满子弹 尽情驰骋 但是油箱里没有一滴油
[01:55.06]像游轮一样航行 把你浑身弄湿 就像开着水上摩托艇一样
[01:58.10]活到一百零三岁 这是我爱不释手的好东西
[02:01.00]阿姨想要为我祈祷 最好为我的敌人祈祷
[02:03.74]人生给我如柠檬一般的磨难 所以我开始奋起反抗
[02:07.10]我有一把AR F15步枪 两把格洛克手枪和一把0.233口径的枪
[02:09.85]绝对不要为了求证在网上发出威胁警告
[02:12.82]我们不会跟敌人掀起骂战 我们把这些破事留给告密者
[02:15.67]不要告诉我究竟是谁暗中告密 我最后一次警告你
[02:18.60]7.62毫米的步枪倾泻火力 就像大黄蜂一样 他开始变形
[02:21.29]派你的朋友加入混战 但是他们永远也回不来了
[02:24.56]朝着车子开枪 把轮胎打爆 他因为剧烈撞击而死
[02:27.41]我的枪手是健身狂人 但是对他干掉的人闭口不提
[02:30.27]我们让你登上电视新闻 我打赌你的家人看见你的死讯
